bibl.title: P. Köln IV 196: A Remark.
bibl.note: The abbreviations "oual()?, ouale()" in lines 16, 23, and 32 of P. Köln IV, 196 can be resolved as "Oualerianon" or "Oualerianou". The third text (unedited) on the recto of P. Lond. III, 1157 proves that also in years later than year 1 of the Augusti Valerianus and Gallienus only "Oualerianou" could be used.
bibl.seg: Sijpesteijn Pieter Johannes, P. Köln IV 196: A Remark.

The abbreviations "oual()?, ouale()" in lines 16, 23, and 32 of P. Köln IV, 196 can be resolved as "Oualerianon" or "Oualerianou". The third text (unedited) on the recto of P. Lond. III, 1157 proves that also in years later than year 1 of the Augusti Valerianus and Gallienus only "Oualerianou" could be used.
